title: People Are Booking Airbnbs in Ukraine as a Way to Send Aid
sub_head: Grass-roots social-media campaign generates nearly $2 million for Ukrainians during Russian invasion, company says
body:
Airbnb Inc . hosts located in parts of war-ravaged Ukraine are seeing a surge in online bookings from guests who don’t intend to show up—but do want to show their support.
A social-media campaign that took off on March 2 has generated thousands of reservations across the country, even as invading Russian forces ​​indiscriminately shell civilian neighborhoods in cities like Kharkiv, Chernihiv, Mariupol and Sumy.
